mrporter.com.notes: LUXURY SITE. Requires Chromium with undetected-chromedriver. Heavy Cloudflare.

thearmoury.com.notes: JAVASCRIPT REQUIRED. Content loads via React. Need Playwright/Selenium.

oxfordclothbuttondown.com.notes: CLOUDFLARE PROTECTED. Preppy/trad authority but needs cloudscraper.

hypebeast.com.notes: JAVASCRIPT REQUIRED. Returns 405 Method Not Allowed. Need browser automation.

grailed.com.notes: CLOUDFLARE PROTECTED. Marketplace site with heavy protection.
